title: Maul
content:
is are used in many dwarven competitions, testing who can throw them the farthest while enduring the most ale.

Maul Location & Where to Find

Location: Blighted Village (Moonheaven). Entering by the East Gate (after crossing the bridge with dead goblins and tieflings). The gate has the sign "Moonhaven" with a dead tiefling next to it. Cross the gate and you will find a "Water Pump" on your right. From the pump, turn slightly to the right, and you will see "Shabby Wooden Doors". You will need a
